snippet: One person was wounded in a shooting at Paine College in Augusta, the second shooting on the campus in two days, officials said.
abstract: One person is wounded in shooting at Paine College in Augusta, Ga; it is unclear whether incident is related to shooting at the campus two days earlier, in which two people received minor injuries.
lead_paragraph: One person was wounded in a shooting at Paine College in Augusta, the second shooting on the campus in two days, officials said.

headline.main: Georgia: One Wounded in Second Shooting at College
headline.print_headline: Georgia: One Wounded in Second Shooting at College
